function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases through the reuse of materials and prefabricated components in construction","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and infection in built environments","Mitigation":"Implement strict cleaning and disinfection protocols for reused materials and prefabricated components. Enforce guidelines for safe handling and storage of materials to prevent contamination.","Technologies":"Advanced cleaning and disinfection technologies, smart sensors for monitoring material condition, digital material passports for tracking material history","People":"Construction workers, building occupants, and maintenance staff","Owner":"Construction companies, building owners, and facility management"}]}
